cause.description:
If you feel the need to help Kory help himself, than please take some time to donate money of any kind (pounds, euros, pesos, rupees) so that Kory can buy himself a wife straight from Russia.
For more information please go to mailorderbrides.com
For just as little as one dollar a day, you can help support Kory in his quest for true love. It's really not that much. It's about 10% from your afternoon full body rub and tug massage. Your generous donation can make a difference.
1. Kory's celebacy must end.
2. Russian is the language of love.
3. Over 3/4 of russian women are unhappy.
cause.mission: raise enough money so that Kory can buy a mail order bride from Russia.
cause.name: Buy Me a Girlfriend
